column4: I have IBM lenovo R60e - would Ubuntu or Kubuntu run and look better on there?
Ubuntu will always look better - but then, I might just be a Gnome fancreature.
hello gnomefancreature ^^ and performance/functional wise they are the same?
pretty much. Assuming you've got a modern(ish) machine with a decent amount of RAM, either will run fine. Kubuntu/KDE might be a bit heavier on RAM usage, that's all.
